    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114098</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114098</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Investigating induced e.m.f.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachforschendes verursachtes e.m.f.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">E.m.f induit d'investigation.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E.m.f induzido investigando.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">E.m.f indotto di studio.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα προκληθέν e.m.f.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">E.m.f inducido que investiga.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up used to demonstrate that an induced e.m.f. is generated when a bar magnet is dropped through a coil connected to an oscilloscope (a). The oscilloscope trace shows the e.m.f. variation through time (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oscilloscopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solenoids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle Installation, 
die verwendet wird, um zu zeigen daß ein verursachtes e.m.f. 
wird festgelegt, wenn ein Stabmagnet durch eine Spule 
fallengelassen wird, die an ein Oszillograph (a) angeschlossen wird. 
Die Oszillographspur zeigt die e.m.f. Variante durch Zeit (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation expérimentale 
employée pour démontrer qu'un e.m.f induit. est produit quand 
une barre aimantée est lâchée par un enroulement relié à un 
oscilloscope (a). La trace d'oscilloscope montre la variation 
d'e.m.f. par le temps (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação experimental 
usada demonstrar que um e.m.f induzido. é gerado quando um 
ímã de barra é deixado cair através de uma bobina conectada a um 
osciloscópio (a). O traço do osciloscópio mostra a variação
de e.m.f. com o tempo (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto sperimentale
usata per dimostrare che un e.m.f indotto. è generato quando un
magnete di barra è caduto attraverso una bobina collegata ad un 
oscilloscopio (a). La traccia dell'oscilloscopio mostra la 
variazione di e.m.f. con tempo (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να καταδείξει ότι ένα προκληθέν e.m.f. 
παράγεται όταν πέφτουν έναν μαγνήτη ράβδων μέσω ενός πηνίου 
που συνδέεται με έναν παλμογράφο (α). Το ίχνος παλμογράφων 
εμφανίζει παραλλαγή e.m.f. μέσω του χρόνου (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición experimental 
usada para demostrar que un e.m.f inducido. se genera cuando un 
imán de barra se cae a través de una bobina conectada con un 
osciloscopio (a). El rastro del osciloscopio muestra la 
variación de e.m.f. con el tiempo (b).</string>
          </description>
